pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creation of in-Text Summary Table // Creation of tables of summary statistics or counts for clinical data (for 'TLFs'). These tables can be exported as in-text table (with the 'flextable' package) for a Clinical Study Report (Word format) or a 'topline' presentation (PowerPoint format), or as interactive table (with the 'DT' package) to an html document for clinical data review.
